trans-unit.source: Reports information about an ambient property, as part of an <see cref="T:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 报告有关环境属性的信息，作为 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider" /> 实现的一部分。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xaml.AmbientPropertyValue> represents an information item that is returned by calling an <xref:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider> service method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.AmbientPropertyValue> 表示通过调用返回的信息项<xref:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider>服务方法。

trans-unit.source: The `GetAll` methods return enumerations or arrays of <xref:System.Xaml.AmbientPropertyValue> items; the `GetFirst` methods return a single <xref:System.Xaml.AmbientPropertyValue>.
trans-unit.target: `GetAll`方法返回枚举或数组的<xref:System.Xaml.AmbientPropertyValue>项;`GetFirst`方法返回单个<xref:System.Xaml.AmbientPropertyValue>。

trans-unit.source: About Ambient Properties
trans-unit.target: 有关环境属性

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a property whose property value should be available to value converter usage in the XAML node structure and to the object graph underneath it.
trans-unit.target: 环境属性是其属性值应为可供值转换器用法，XAML 节点结构中其下的对象图的属性。

trans-unit.source: The ambient concept is relevant for a XAML processor during the object-writing phase of the load path or the serialization phase of a save path.
trans-unit.target: 在加载路径的对象编写阶段或保存的序列化阶段期间的环境概念是 XAML 处理器相关路径。

trans-unit.source: A type can also be attributed as ambient.
trans-unit.target: 一种类型还可以特性化为环境。

trans-unit.source: In this case, all properties that use the attributed type are reported as ambient.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，使用的特性化的类型的所有属性都报告为环境。

trans-unit.source: In the load path case, the ambient property value might influence the object graph produced value of other properties that exist underneath it in a XAML node structure.
trans-unit.target: 在加载路径的情况下，环境属性值可能会影响在 XAML 节点结构中其下存在其他属性的对象关系图生成值。

trans-unit.source: When processed as a XAML node stream, the ambient concept implies that the ambient property value must be available to type converters and markup extensions from `StartObject` to `EndObject`.
trans-unit.target: 当处理为 XAML 节点流，环境概念意味着环境属性值必须是可供类型转换器和标记扩展`StartObject`到`EndObject`。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, a type converter or markup extension that is used for the save path can look up the ambient property and its value.
trans-unit.target: 同样，类型转换器或标记扩展使用于保存路径可以查找环境的属性和它的值。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the XAML that is produced is a better round-trip representation.
trans-unit.target: 因此，生成的 XAML 是更好的往返过程表示形式。

trans-unit.source: By its language definition, XAML does not specify the order in which members of an object must be processed.
trans-unit.target: 根据其语言定义，XAML 未指定对象的成员必须处理的顺序。

trans-unit.source: However, any ambient property value must be processed first by the XAML reader so that the type converter and markup extension usage that are contained in other properties can access it through the <xref:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider> service.
trans-unit.target: 但是，任何环境属性值都必须先通过 XAML 读取器处理，以便其他属性中包含的类型转换器和标记扩展用法可以访问它通过<xref:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider>服务。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.DependsOn%2A> is a similar concept that also influences XAML node-processing order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.DependsOn%2A> 是一个类似的概念，也会影响 XAML 节点处理顺序。

trans-unit.source: However, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.DependsOn%2A> can only be used for peer member and node relationships; it cannot influence all descendants.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.DependsOn%2A>仅用于对等成员和节点关系; 它不能影响所有后代。

trans-unit.source: Also, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.DependsOn%2A> directly influences object graph property setting, whereas the ambient technique relies on type converters or markup extensions.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember.DependsOn%2A>直接影响对象关系图属性设置，而依赖于类型转换器或标记扩展的环境的技术。

trans-unit.source: In the ambient technique, there must also be a specific type converter or markup extension definition.
trans-unit.target: 在环境的技术中，还必须有特定的类型转换器或标记扩展定义。

trans-unit.source: It is up to each type converter or markup extension to determine how the ambient property value should be interpreted and applied to the object graph location where the type converter or markup extension is used.
trans-unit.target: 它是最多每个类型转换器或标记扩展，用于确定应如何解释和应用于类型转换器或标记扩展使用对象关系图位置的环境属性值。

trans-unit.source: WPF Usage Notes
trans-unit.target: WPF 用法说明

trans-unit.source: An ambient property scenario that is illustrated in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] feature set is <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which can qualify the necessary property name lookups for other values.
trans-unit.target: 如下所示的环境属性方案[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]功能集<xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，这可以限定必要的属性名称查找有关其他值。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> value qualifies the <xref:System.Windows.Setter.Property%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> values in the XAML nodes underneath it.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>值限定<xref:System.Windows.Setter.Property%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>其下的 XAML 节点中的值。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Setter.Property%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> uses the type converter behavior for a <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Setter.Property%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 使用的类型转换器行为<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty>。

trans-unit.source: This behavior accesses the ambient <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> value by querying <xref:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider.GetFirstAmbientValue%2A> from a service context that is available to type converters and markup extensions.
trans-unit.target: 此行为活动访问环境<xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>值通过查询<xref:System.Xaml.IAmbientProvider.GetFirstAmbientValue%2A>程序是可供类型转换器和标记扩展的服务上下文中。

trans-unit.source: The identifier that represents the ambient property.
trans-unit.target: 表示环境属性的标识符。

trans-unit.source: The value to report.
trans-unit.target: 要报告的值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.AmbientPropertyValue" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xaml.AmbientPropertyValue" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the XAML type system identifier (<see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlMember" />) that represents the ambient property.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示环境属性的 XAML 类型系统标识符 (<see cref="T:System.Xaml.XamlMember" />)。

trans-unit.source: The identifier that represents the ambient property.
trans-unit.target: 表示环境属性的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the ambient property.
trans-unit.target: 获取环境属性的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the ambient property.
trans-unit.target: 环境属性的值。
